headline: Newmont Corporation (NEM) Up More Than 117% YTD, Here’s Why
summary: ​Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the Best Very Cheap Stocks to Invest In. Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is up more than 117% on a year-to-date basis, mainly due to record-high gold prices during the year. Wall Street has a bullish sentiment on the stock despite the company posting lower production levels for fiscal Q3 2025. […]

headline: Does Newmont’s 136% Rally Signal a Missed Opportunity After Gold Price Surge?
summary: Wondering if Newmont could be the undervalued gem you've been looking for? We are diving deep into what the market might be missing and why it matters now. Shares have increased by 135.9% year-to-date, and they are up 119.0% over the last year, signaling a significant shift in investor sentiment. Recent news highlighting gold price surges and increased demand for precious metals has driven renewed interest in Newmont. Analysts are focusing on its strategic acquisitions and...
